resources.string: Where is the Gateway of India located?

Game of Thrones Trivia is a trivia game based on the Game of Thrones series. 
Just for fun, while we wait for the final season. 

Players have a short amount of time to answer questions correctly. As you build points, you would be able to unlock other quiz levels. 

To unlock the middle level, you need to have 90 points. 

To unlock the hard level, you need to have 180 points. 

Have fun!
Congratulations! You have unlocked the medium challenge
Congratulations! You have unlocked the hard challenge
